mapper.select: SELECT sid, uid, gid, label, analysis_start_date, analysis_end_date, analyzed_at, memo FROM trade_strategies WHERE uid = #{uid} AND sid = #{sid}
SELECT sid, uid, gid, label, analysis_start_date, analysis_end_date, analyzed_at, memo FROM trade_strategies WHERE uid = #{uid} ORDER BY sid

INSERT INTO trade_strategies ( uid, gid, label, analysis_start_date, analysis_end_date, analyzed_at, memo ) VALUES ( #{strategy.uid}, #{strategy.gid}, #{strategy.label}, #{strategy.analysisStartDate}, #{strategy.analysisEndDate}, #{strategy.analyzedAt}, #{strategy.memo} ) RETURNING sid
